# The `BufferFatPtrTypeLoweringBase` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Recursively replace instances of ptr addrspace(7) and vector&lt;Nxptr addrspace(7)&gt; with some other type as defined by the relevant subclass. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>class anonymous_namespace{AMDGPULowerBufferFatPointers.cpp}::BufferFatPtrTypeLoweringBase</CodeBlock>

## Base class

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuemaptyperemapper">ValueMapTypeRemapper</a></>}>
This is a class that can be implemented by clients to remap types when cloning constants and instructions. <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/valuemaptyperemapper/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

## Derived Classes

<MembersIndex>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpulowerbufferfatpointers-cpp-/bufferfatptrtointtypemap">BufferFatPtrToIntTypeMap</a></>}>
Remap ptr addrspace(7) to i160 and vector&lt;Nxptr addrspace(7)&gt; to vector&lt;Nxi60&gt; in order to correctly handling loading/storing these values from memory. <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpulowerbufferfatpointers-cpp-/bufferfatptrtointtypemap/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

<MembersIndexItem
  type="class"
  name={<><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpulowerbufferfatpointers-cpp-/bufferfatptrtostructtypemap">BufferFatPtrToStructTypeMap</a></>}>
Remap ptr addrspace(7) to &#123;ptr addrspace(8), i32&#125; (the resource and offset parts of the pointer) so that we can easily rewrite operations on these values that aren&#39;t loading them from or storing them to memory. <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-amdgpulowerbufferfatpointers-cpp-/bufferfatptrtostructtypemap/#details">More...</a>
</MembersIndexItem>

</MembersIndex>

## Description {#details}

Recursively replace instances of ptr addrspace(7) and vector&lt;Nxptr addrspace(7)&gt; with some other type as defined by the relevant subclass.

Definition at line 259 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/amdgpulowerbufferfatpointers-cpp">AMDGPULowerBufferFatPointers.cpp</a>.
